name: Mountain Rush - Free Addicting Snowboarding Racing Game (By Top Free Addicting Games)
name_original: Mountain Rush - Free Addicting Snowboarding Racing Game (By Top Free Addicting Games)
description:
* By Top Free Addicting Games *

Hit the slopes on your own or compete against your friends in our multi player action packed mode where you can actually see the progress of your friends on your screen!

- Unlock New Characters
- Progress to New Levels
- Unlock New Maps
- Collect coins and Power-Ups
- Perform Crazy Tricks
- And Much More!!!

This Top Free Addicting Snowboarding Racing Game will challenge you and keep you busy. See why it's one of the most exciting snowboarding games in the App Store!

Download it while it's FREE!
